description:
The server provides immediate access to millions of academic papers through Semantic Scholar and arXiv, enabling AI-powered research with comprehensive search, citation analysis, and full-text PDF extraction from multiple sources (arXiv and Wiley open-access).

 - No API key is required.

WILEY_TDM_CLIENT_TOKEN.description: Your Wiley TDM Client Token for downloading papers
